attributes.action: Abolish bully XL and BSL stop slaughter of bully breed rescue dogs
attributes.additional_details:
Stop bully  XL ban and abolish outdated  BSL Infavor of the return of dog licences all dogs should have third-party insurance and be kept on a lead in public places 
BSL shouldn't mean that if your dog looks a certain type its automatically a killer dog It's outdated legislation
attributes.background:
We want Bully XL and BSL Abolished in favor of dog licence and third-party insurance for dogs and to put a stop to euthanasia of dogs in rescue bully XL and bully types that will happen after 31st December 2023 
In what way is it right to kill innocent dogs

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Require licences for owners of XL Bully dogs instead of a ban/muzzles/neutering: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650449
